  • rot90

rot90¶

brg.numerical.linalg.rot90(vectors, axes)[source]¶

Rotate an array of vectors over 90 degrees around an array of axes.

Compute the cross product of each vector and its corresponding axis. Rescale the normal vectors to match the length of the original vectors.

Parameters:
  • vectors (array) – An array of vectors.
  • axes (array) – An array of axes.
Returns:

...
